title: Queue "Dodging"
body:
I was in a blind pick lobby, and my internet died for a split second, making me "dodge" the league match. I was using Curse during this and I got back on Curse almost instantly, but not LoL. The client said I had dodged the queue. Rito pls.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body:
Your network was probably having a difficult time reconnecting with the game server for one reason or another. Your own internet was fine, something was just blocking it from reaching the game server you were in. 

Go through our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for some steps that will make it easier for your network to talk to ours.
